rev.comment: rm non-free images in tabular format per [[WP:NFG]]

Line 21: Line 21:
| [[File:Flag of the European Coal and Steel Community 12 Star Version.svg|100px]] || 1958<ref>Designed showed, with 12 stars, was used from 1986. Previously the number of stars depended on [[European Union member state|number of states]] and shade of blue was darker.</ref> – 2002 || [[Flag of the European Coal and Steel Community|Flag of the]] [[European Coal and Steel Community]] || Two horizontal bars, blue on top and black below, with white stars in two rows along the middle. Number of stars depended on states, but fixed at 12 from 1986.
| [[File:Flag of the European Coal and Steel Community 12 Star Version.svg|100px]] || 1958<ref>Designed showed, with 12 stars, was used from 1986. Previously the number of stars depended on [[European Union member state|number of states]] and shade of blue was darker.</ref> – 2002 || [[Flag of the European Coal and Steel Community|Flag of the]] [[European Coal and Steel Community]] || Two horizontal bars, blue on top and black below, with white stars in two rows along the middle. Number of stars depended on states, but fixed at 12 from 1986.
|-
